metadata.source: NSE Index Constituents - NIFTY 100 + NIFTY MIDCAP 100
metadata.description: FORTRESS MOMENTUM Universe - Enhanced with Zerodha Kite API compatible symbols

notes.zerodha_api_usage: Use exchange:tradingsymbol format for API calls (e.g., 'NSE:NIFTY 50' for indices, 'NSE:RELIANCE' for stocks)
notes.index_segment: Indices use segment='INDICES' in Zerodha instruments dump
notes.etf_segment: ETFs use segment='EQ' and can be traded like regular stocks
notes.sector_update: Added AUTOMOBILES sector for auto OEMs and components

benchmark.description: NSE NIFTY 50 Index - Top 50 large cap stocks

NIFTY_FIN_SERVICE.description: Financial services including banks, NBFCs, insurance

gold.description: Gold ETF - tracks domestic gold prices

cash.description: Liquid ETF - overnight rate returns, cash equivalent for margin

cash_liquid.description: Liquid fund ETF - cash equivalent for defensive allocation

primary_etf.description: Nifty Infrastructure ETF - includes capital goods

ENERGY.note: No direct ETF - use INFRABEES or constituent stocks

METALS_MINING.note: No direct Metal ETF - use commodity ETFs or stocks

CONSUMER_DISCRETIONARY.note: No direct Auto ETF - use constituent stocks

REAL_ESTATE.note: No direct Realty ETF - use constituent stocks

AUTOMOBILES.note: No direct Auto ETF - use constituent stocks

ENERGY.description: Oil & Gas, Integrated Energy, Gas Distribution

stocks.name: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd.
CG Power and Industrial Solutions Ltd.
Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company Ltd.
ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Ltd.
Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd.
Indian Railway Catering And Tourism Corporation Ltd.
Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency Ltd.
SBI Cards and Payment Services Ltd.

excluded: DUMMYHDLVR - Dummy Hindustan Unilever Ltd. (test entry in largecap CSV)

sector_mapping_rationale.Power_vs_OIL_GAS_ENERGY: Kept Power separate from Oil & Gas for granular energy sector tracking
sector_mapping_rationale.Construction_vs_Construction_Materials: Both mapped to CEMENT_CONSTRUCTION as per spec
sector_mapping_rationale.Services: Generic services (ports, aviation) kept separate from Consumer Services (retail, hotels)
